subject: Tennis
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Marcos Giron of U.C.L.A. beat Pepperdine’s Alex Sarkissian, 6-4, 6-1, to win the Bruins’ 11th national men’s singles title Monday.
snippet: Marcos Giron of U.C.L.A. beat Pepperdine’s Alex Sarkissian, 6-4, 6-1, to win the Bruins’ 11th national men’s singles title Monday.
